date_of_birth.description: Date of birth format: yyyy-mm-dd. Only required for clients with real-money accounts.

new_password.description: New password for validation (length within 6-25 chars, accepts any printable ASCII characters, need to include capital and lowercase letters with numbers). Password strength is evaluated with: http://archive.geekwisdom.com/js/passwordmeter.js

verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a verify_email call, which must be done first)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
